message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll love it. My initial offer is $2000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider the value it brings. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. My revised offer is $1800000.
I'm willing to meet you at $1600000, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Is this a deal?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My revised offer is $1900000. I'm confident you'll see the value it brings.
I'm willing to meet you at $1700000, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Is this a deal?

I can see you're getting close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My revised offer is $1950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings.
I'm willing to meet you at $1800000, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. This is my final offer. Please let me know if it's acceptable.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the product's true value. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My revised offer is $1980000. I believe this is the best price we can both agree on.
